overview.heading: Parsippany Virtual Office
overview.body: Looking for a top-tier Parsippany address but want to bypass the complexity of a physical office? Opus VO is exactly what you need. Establish your business presence in Parsippany’s lively commercial landscape while keeping your financials in check. For those key client consultations or essential team meetings, our cutting-edge conference rooms are ready for use.  By selecting our virtual workspace in Parsippany, you’re securing more than just an impressive address. You’ll also acquire the support of a live receptionist who will smoothly integrate into your team’s workflow. They’ll ensure that every customer interaction resonates with your brand, freeing us to manage the admin work so you can focus on your vital business objectives.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Parsippany, New Jersey even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Parsippany. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within New Jersey.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Parsippany virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Parsippany?
sections.body: Parsippany is not just a suburban oasis; it’s a robust business environment that provides opportunities in a multitude of sectors such as tech, healthcare, and logistics. Having a Parsippany address adds instant credibility to your business and opens doors to valuable networking events and vital industry contacts.  Choosing Opus VO as your virtual workspace in Parsippany is more than a logistical convenience; it’s a calculated move to get ahead. Ready to take your business to the next level? Explore our comprehensive range of virtual workspace solutions today.  Opus VO, Parsippany @ 8 Campus Drive, Parsippany, NJ 07054
